item.title: A question that not even you can awnser!

item.description:
@Patchumz wrote:

Is the item a weapon, for one… and 2, Why did you post another thread?!

Oh, and AS I ALREADY SAID… in the last thread… the spot you put it in the code doesn’t really matter, just put it at the end if you aren’t sure.

item.title: A question that not even you can awnser!
item.dc:creator: @camo_chao camo chao
item.description:
@camo_chao wrote:

Where exactally should I put this code? (After what? If it can be anywhere, pick a spot and tell me there)[br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 04:16:24 PM[/size][hr]Ok, I got the server to compile correctly with

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3098 && playerRights <1) { deleteItem(3098, getItemSlot(3098), 1); sendMessage("This item is Mod/Admin Only! Become a Mod/Admin!"); }
but it doesn’t work, when I equip the item, it just works regularly even though I’m not a mod or admin…

Read full topic

item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Taylor John0, if you don’t know what you’re doing, don’t try to help someone else who also doesn’t know.

You did have the right idea though.

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 773 && playerRights <= 1) { //Perfect ring deleteItem(773, GetItemSlot(773), 1); }
